title: Spacious two floor condo with 3-4bdr/2-3 home offices
posting_body: This bright and spacious two floor condominium in a quintessential JP triple decker is perfect for commuting to the longwood medical area.
6 room condo allows for flexible layout and individual home office spaces.
Located on the top two floors, this bright and spacious 3-4 bedroom/2-3 office/2 bath offers an inviting, open floor plan with massive windows that flood the space with light.
The eat-in kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and recessed lighting.
The kitchen opens to a dining room/living room big enough for a large sectional.
Off the kitchen is a private deck overlooking the peaceful shared backyard.
The master bedroom on the lower level is actually two large rooms connected by antique pocket doors and makes a perfect ensuite office.
Other notable features are private storage and dedicated free laundry in the basement, deeded tandem parking space in driveway, and private entrance.
Your would-be neighbors are friendly medical professionals.
The HOA is close knit, supportive, and cares a lot about the building/community.
We are also looking for kind and conscientious neighbors.
With easy access to the Longwood medical area and quick transit to MGH.
Whole Foods literally around the corner and almost any type of restaurant you can imagine within walk/bike distance.
Walk to Jamaica Pond, Emerald Necklace, and Centre Street Shops.
Less than half a mile (10 min walk) from the Orange Line (Jackson) and Green Line (Heath Street) and 39 Bus.
On signing, first and last month's rent, and $4000 security deposit due.
Tenants pay electricity and heating oil.
One tandem parking spot available.
No smoking.
No dogs, cats ok.
Requirements: Combined gross monthly income 3x rent (or guarantor), credit score 650+, background check.
No application fee required.
